channel.title: U.S. Police Shooting News Tracker
channel.description: Automated news aggregation tracking police-involved shootings in the United States

item.title: Jan. 6 plaque made to honor law enforcement. It's nowhere to be found at the Capitol
item.description: Approaching the fifth anniversary of the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the Capitol, the official plaque honoring the police who defended democracy is nowhere to be found

item.title: How Japan is fighting back against a surge of bear attacks
item.description: ODATE, Japan — Before students can come out to play at his school, Yoji Hikage has to give the all clear.

item.title: National Guard arrives in New Orleans for 1st New Year's since Bourbon Street attack
item.description: Nearly a year after a New Year's Day truck attack on Bourbon Street left 14 dead, New Orleans officials are still seeking permanent security solutions

item.title: National Guard deploying to New Orleans as city marks 1 year since terror attack
item.description: The Guard members will stay through Carnival season, when residents and tourists descend on the Big Easy to partake in costumed celebrations and massive parades before ending with Mardi Gras.

item.title: National Guard to patrol New Orleans for New Year's a year after deadly attack
item.description: A National Guard deployment in New Orleans authorized by President Donald Trump will begin Tuesday as part of a heavy security presence for New Year’s celebrations

item.title: Families of Bondi Beach victims demand more federal action on antisemitism and security failures
item.description: Families of victims of the recent Sydney massacre are urging more federal action to investigate rising antisemitism and security failures

item.title: Delaware State Police say DMV gunman let customers leave, fired at approaching officers
item.description: Investigators say a man accused of fatally shooting a Delaware State Police trooper at a DMV office allowed customers to leave and then fired at approaching officers before being killed

item.title: Australia announces bravery award for heroes of Bondi Beach attack
item.description: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has announced a national bravery award to honor those who confronted an antisemitic terror attack.

item.title: Albanese announces bravery award for heroes of Bondi antisemitic attack
item.description: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has announced a national bravery award to honor those who confronted an antisemitic terror attack

item.title: Pentagon to send 350 National Guard troops to New Orleans as violent crime surges ahead of major events
item.description: More than 300 national Guard troops will assist law enforcement in New Orleans through Mardi Gras as officials work to combat rising violent crime.

item.title: Bureaucratic mishap delayed gun license for accused Bondi Beach shooter in Australia
item.description: An Australian state leader says a man accused of killing 15 people at Sydney’s Bondi Beach faced a lengthy gun license delay due to bureaucracy, not suspicion

item.title: Thousands of mourners gather at Bondi Beach to honor attack victims
item.description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese, whose government earlier this year recongized a Palestinian state, was booed by the crowd.

item.title: One week on from Bondi Beach attack, Australia orders security review as thousands attend memorial
item.description: Thousands turned out for a memorial on Sunday, one week on from the Bondi Beach mass shooting that shook Australia, as officials announced a review of the country's law enforcement and intelligence agencies

item.title: Australia marks Day of Reflection for Bondi Beach shooting victims
item.description: Australians are lighting candles Sunday to remember the victims of a mass shooting at a Jewish festival in Sydney's Bondi Beach

item.title: After Bondi Beach attack, 'intifada' chants face restrictions in Australia and the U.K.
item.description: LONDON — Authorities in Britain and Australia are tightening restrictions on pro-Palestinians protests in response to the Islamic State-inspired Bondi Beach massacre targeting a Jewish gathering that killed 15 people

item.title: Deadly attacks in Australia and Syria show a diminished ISIS is still a threat
item.description: A pair of deadly attacks in Syria and Australia has shone a fresh spotlight on the Islamic State, the militant group.

item.title: Families mourn loved ones lost in Bondi Beach terror attack: ‘No words can describe the pain’
item.description: Families of Bondi Beach shooting victims share heartbreaking tributes to their loved ones killed in the deadly terror attack during Hanukkah celebration.

item.title: Phil Mickelson pushes back on Australian PM's push for even tougher gun laws after Hanukkah terror attack
item.description: Phil Mickelson responded to Australia shooting debate while heroic bystanders Boris and Sofia Gurman died trying to stop the Bondi Beach gunmen during the massacre.

item.title: Alleged Bondi Beach gunman charged with 15 counts of murder, police say
item.description: The man who allegedly opened fire on a Jewish gathering at Australia’s Bondi Beach has been charged with 15 counts of murder, New South Wales Police said.

item.title: Plans for attack in New Orleans thwarted, authorities say
item.description: Authorities say plans for an attack in New Orleans were thwarted after an ex-Marine was arrested

item.title: 10-year-old girl, Holocaust survivor among victims of deadly Australia Hanukkah attack
item.description: Bondi Beach terror attack during Hanukkah celebration leaves at least 15 dead in Sydney, including 10-year-old girl and a Holocaust survivor.

item.title: Washington man allegedly lures police with bogus 911 call, slashes officer in face
item.description: Man charged after stabbing Bellevue police officer in face during ambush attack following a bogus 911 call at a transit center near Seattle on Tuesday.

item.title: Bystanders seen confronting Australian gunman during ISIS-inspired deadly rampage
item.description: Heroic bystanders were seen on video disarming an ISIS-inspired gunman on a deadly shooting rampage in Sydney, Australia, during a Hanukkah celebration.

item.title: New video shows elderly couple trying to tackle Bondi gunman
item.description: Dramatic new footage has emerged showing an elderly couple who were killed in the Bondi Beach shooting attempt to stop and disarm one of the gunmen.

item.title: Pope Leo XIV condemns 'antisemitic violence' after massacre in Sydney: 'We must eliminate hatred'
item.description: Pope Leo XIV offered prayers and condemned "antisemitic violence" following a shooting at a Hanukkah celebration in Sydney killed 15 victims.

item.title: Australia moves to tighten gun laws after Hanukkah mass shooting leaves 15 dead at Bondi Beach
item.description: Australia is vowing to enact tougher gun controls after a targeted Hanukkah shooting at Bondi Beach leaves 15 dead and many people injured.

item.title: Mamdani condemns ‘antisemitic terror’ after Hanukkah massacre — but mum on ‘globalize the intifada’
item.description: NYC mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani condemns Australia Hanukkah attack as "vile antisemitic terror" but stops short of condemning controversial phrase.

item.title: What we know about the father and son suspects in the Bondi Beach attack
item.description: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said the suspects in the shooting at the Hanukkah event in Sydney were “clearly” motivated by extremist ideology.

item.title: ‘We warned them’ Jewish leader says after Bondi Beach terror attack that kills 15
item.description: Jewish leader says government ignored warnings before deadly Bondi Beach terror attack at Hanukkah event killed 15. "We warned them this would happen."

item.title: Photos show the scene of a deadly attack on Sydney's Bondi Beach
item.description:
Two gunmen shot dead at least 11 people on Sunday during a Jewish holiday celebration at Sydney’s Bondi Beach, Australian authorities said, declaring it a terrorist attack. One gunman was fatally shot by police and the second arrested.
___
This is a photo g…

item.title: Suspects in deadly Bondi Beach attack identified as father and son
item.description: The 50-year-old father was shot and killed by police, and the 24-year-old son is hospitalized, New South Wales Police Commissioner Mal Lanyon said.

item.title: Mass shootings are rare in Australia. Here is a look at some previous attacks
item.description: Police say at least 11 people were killed Sunday in a shooting attack on a Jewish community event at Sydney’s Bondi Beach

item.title: Gunmen kill 9 people at Sydney's Bondi Beach with 1 shooter dead and another arrested
item.description: Two gunmen have shot dead nine people at Sydney’s Bondi Beach

item.title: A list of deadly shootings on college campuses in the US
item.description: The latest shooting on a college campus in the U.S. unfolded Saturday at Brown University in Providence, Rhode Island

item.title: Family of 16-year-old killed by police in San Diego to receive $30 million settlement
item.description: The family of Konoa Wilson will receive $30 million from the city of San Diego after the 16-year-old was shot and killed by a police officer in January while fleeing gunfire. Carter Evans reports.

item.title: $30 million settlement approved for family of teen killed by San Diego police
item.description: The settlement approved for Konoa Wilson's family exceeds the $27 million the city of Minneapolis agreed to pay the family of George Floyd.

item.title: San Diego officials approve $30M settlement for family of teen killed by police
item.description: The San Diego City Council has approved a $30 million payment to the family of a 16-year-old killed by police

item.title: Recent Baltimore County police shootings raise concerns over mental health response
item.description: All four incidents where people were killed by Baltimore County police this year involved subjects with mental health issues, according to family members.
